name: Atikkabrett-Atikkabrett-6717985
material_entries: Massivholz Fichte / Tanne / Lärche, luftgetr., gehobelt
Massivholz Fichte / Tanne / Lärche, luftgetr., gehobelt, Produktion Schweiz
reason: luftgetrocknet (air-dried) is better suited, because air-dried wood is already acclimatized to ambient outdoor moisture levels
the attribute rau (rough) is not an option, since it is not a hidden structural element
therefore the luftgetrocknet, gehobelt are used
